Description:
Chelsie
				Chelsie is a compact architectural light that defines pathways, characterised by a fluid and minimalist design. Available in two sizes, it functions as a step light in the more compact version and as a floor washer in the Ø140 model, which provides greater visual impact and higher light output.

									
					
						
Designed to create refined lighting effects in outdoor environments, Chelsie provides uniform, enveloping illumination that softens contrasts and enhances the natural perception of space.
 
The metal lamp body, sober and with no visible screws, features an open beam with high output that ensures effective, even lighting, while the light source is completely concealed by a gentle recess – the design’s signature graphic feature. Patrick Norguet’s design leaves room for decorative appeal, without sacrificing the technical function and formal clarity that characterise this type of outdoor lamp.
 
The matt finishes – black, anthracite, grey, natural brown and champagne – make Chelsie a versatile solution for a wide variety of contexts. The step light version is also available in white, expanding its versatility for indoor use and giving designers even greater creative freedom.

Name: Bugia, Design by Andrea Tosetto, 2016-2020
Short description:
Bugia
				Round, compact forms featuring elegant finishes with a centre that shines like a precious stone. Once lit u...
Description:
Bugia
				Round, compact forms featuring elegant finishes with a centre that shines like a precious stone. Once lit up, Bugia amazes with the unexpected effect of its light. A surprising and harmonious balance between direct and indirect light, diffused both downward and up toward the ceiling. A rich family of ceiling lights, in Single, Double, Triple and now also Mega versions.

									
					
						Bugia is a compact ceiling lamp characterised by the minimalist design of its diffuser, embellished by shiny and sophisticated finishes. When lit, it catches the eye, diffusing a soft light throughout the entire space; not only downward from the crystal lens, but also – unexpectedly – up toward the ceiling, through a side diffuser in opaline polycarbonate. Either single or in a composition of multiple light sources, Bugia is ideal for lighting up any sized space, perfectly catering to any type of style thanks to the three available finishes: white, chrome and glossy copper.
 
Bugia Single is supported by a metal structure fixed to the ceiling with magnets, while the Double, Triple and Mega versions are supported by a round closure element in the same colour as the diffuser. Bugia Mega amplifies the size of Triple while keeping its proportions unchanged and adopts a lens with a 30% larger diameter that increases light distribution. The 15 W LED light can be selected in either a warmer (2700 K) or colder (3000 K) light colour temperature*. The colour rendering index (CRI) of 90 mirrors the true colour of objects without distorting them.
 
The characteristic lightweight and slim form of Bugia blends in with its surrounds, offering elegant notes of light, making it perfect for any living space, from the living room to the bedroom. And now, thanks to the Mega version, Bugia decorates and illuminates larger sized interiors as well.
* North America: 3000 K only

Name: Kelly sphere, Design by Andrea Tosetto, 2015
Short description:
Kelly sphere
				Seductive beauty with a bold personality thanks to the strong and precise laser cuts, which lighten...
Description:
Kelly sphere
				Seductive beauty with a bold personality thanks to the strong and precise laser cuts, which lighten the metal of the lampshade and create an intriguing play of light and shadow. Kelly is a multifaceted family of suspension and wall lamps that stand out with elegance in any living space thanks to the variety of available forms and finishes.

									
					
						Strong geometric forms and lightweight clusters characterised by special laser cuts that make way for a dynamic play of light and shadow. Made in metal, thanks to their distinct patterns, Kelly suspension and wall lamps are eye-catching even when off, becoming decorative objects that personalise the space.
 
The graphic pattern is the common denominator in this variegated family of lamps. Shaped like a dome, Kelly Dome features a lightweight lampshade with a strong visual impact. Available in three sizes – 50, 60 and 80 cm – and in four elegant finishes, it is particularly suited for lighting up the dining table or to create atmosphere in the living room. The contemporary style of Kelly Sphere, similarly available in three different sizes – 40, 50 and 80 cm – emanates a sense of simplicity and lightness with a touch of magic. In the wall version featured with a width of 25 cm, Kelly helps to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere even in the smallest of spaces.
 
Kelly Dome and Kelly Sphere are suspended from the ceiling by way of three steel cables that keep them perfectly balanced. Inside, a semi-transparent glass diffuser in glossy milk white is designed to house E27 lamps (not included). The wall version includes a 16W LED source with warm light and colour rendering index (CRI) of 92. An attractive and highly functional family of lamps, which harmonise living areas with plays of light in an exclusive balance of full and empty spaces.
